meanings.definition: The act of giving someone permission or power to do something.
meanings.sent1: She needed authorizations from her parents to go to the party.
meanings.sent2: The manager provided the necessary authorizations for the project to proceed.
meanings.sent3: The authorizations to eat all the cookies were granted by the cookie monster.
meanings.sent4: His signature on the document served as the ultimate authorization for the transaction.
meanings.sent5: The golden key symbolized the authorizations to unlock all the doors in the castle.

meanings.definition: The process of officially approving or allowing something to happen.
meanings.sent1: The authorizations for the event were granted by the city council.
meanings.sent2: The authorization of the new policy took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The authorization paperwork got lost in the sea of paperwork on the desk.
meanings.sent4: The authorization stamp on the document made it valid for use.
meanings.sent5: The authorization process was smooth and efficient, thanks to the new software.
